item.description:
Join us for TGIF pizza & pool nite. Come relax, unwind, shoot some pool and meet friends new and old. Enjoy the delicious pizza and appetizers we will order. All levels of players are welcome and we will have some pool lessons for beginners. At the end of the evening, we will have our usual "hot shot" competition for a small gift card prize. Please sign in and pay when you arrive.

Time: 7 pm - 10 pm
Cost: $10

We have had quite a number of new members join in the last 6 months. It would be great to see some of you come out to this event. After pool, we will head over to Tea Infusions for some bubble tea.

How to get there?

MBTA - take B Train (Green line) to Packards Corner and walk 4 blocks. Or to the next stop at Harvard Ave and walk down a few blocks.

Car - parking can be tough, but there are spaces on Brighton Ave and Harvard Ave.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be on 2nd floor - take a left into the large pool room.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: TGIF - Pizza & Pool nite
